plans: Our plans – Monthly ₹1499, Quarterly ₹3999, Yearly ₹12,999. Student discount 10%. Personal training starts at ₹799/session.
timings: We are open Mon–Fri 6:00 AM – 10:00 PM, Sat–Sun 7:00 AM – 9:00 PM.
location: We are located at MG Road, Kozhikode. Parking available.
amenities: Amenities include cardio zone, strength machines, free weights, functional area, locker rooms and showers.
personal_training: Certified male & female trainers available. Packages: 8 / 12 / 16 sessions per month.
fallback: I didn't catch that. Ask me about plans, timings, amenities, trainers, or type 'trial' to book a free session.
